body:
Yes. I even first thought about excluding the `season` model from the factory linting. But then I thought, there are some explicit tests for this functionality in place anyways and the DB is wiped after each test anyways, so I thought it would be fine.

Can undo it if you have concerns about it ✌️
body_html:
